Name: The secret pyramid VR
About the game: Note that 《The Secret Pyramid VR》currently is about 40 minutes. However, we expect to increase the content of the game to more than three times within one year through continuous updating. (including but not limited to levels, weapons, artifacts, monsters, etc.) You can try free DEMO first, and then decide whether to buy it. At present, compared with the paid version, DEMO only lacks one level which is difficult，and some weapons. However, no more content will be added in the future for this version. About this game It is an VR adventure level-based game featuring FPS, roguelite elements. The player plays an adventurer, who explores the ancient Egyptian tombs in a parallel world, and goes deep into the huge underground world to find the legendary secret treasure. Every level is random, each new restart after each failure is a brand-new experience. Players can find all kinds of weapons, as well as artifacts with special abilities. The combination of different weapons and abilities will completely change the game mode and bring unique customs clearance experience. Various Weapons: Classic Glock pistols, Scorpion Submachine Gun, SawnOff Shotgun, etc. Crazy Flamethrowers, Explosive Crossbows, Fuel Rod Guns, etc. Plasma pistol, Okan Laser, Gravity Gun, etc. Powerful ancient Artifacts: Mask of Osiris - can curse the attacker. Horus's Wristband - Can cause instant time to stop. Ankh' Guardian - can provide blood sucking ability. Element Ring - can apply different effects such as freezing, petrifying and burning to monsters. And so on. Monsters Slowly moving mummies. The rampaging cemetery guards. Crowds of scarabs. Cannibal scorpions that corrode everything. The huge statue of Anubis. The powerful and terrible Pharaohs. And so on.
Developers: 广州雷氪沉浸技术有限公司
Publishers: 广州雷氪沉浸技术有限公司
